content:
I am a senior student studying Computer Science and Information Engineering at the National Taiwan University of Science and Technology, currently seeking a full-time software engineering position.

I have received an Academic Excellence Award for achieving a GPA of 4.22/4.3.

As a Research and Development intern at Microsoft, I work in a cross-country team, writing high-quality code and doing my utmost to enhance the development experience for my coworkers.

In addition to my internship experience, I have worked on various side projects. These include developing a web platform that managed a LineBot for a school administrative unit, and a PyCharm plugin that streamlined assignment submissions to the schoolâ€™s Online Judge server.

In these projects, I collaborated with teams to design and develop software solutions, managed databases, implemented robust APIs, and created user-friendly interfaces. I am passionate about developing high-quality software solutions.

Furthermore, in my spare time, I enjoy developing open-source tools and contributing to open-source projects.

You can reach me via Linkedin or mirrorshih@gmail.com.
